example.title: Chicken Curry
example.description: Tender chicken cooked in an aromatic curry sauce, perfect for a comforting meal full of exotic flavors.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in vegetable oil. Add diced chicken and brown. Add coconut milk and curry powder. Simmer until chicken is tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

example.title: Pad Thai
example.description: Pad Thai is a popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish known for its bold flavors and balance of sweet, sour, and savory tastes.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Soak rice noodles in warm water. Stir-fry tofu/shrimp with garlic and shallots. Add noodles, bean sprouts, and eggs. Mix in tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar. Serve with crushed peanuts and lime wedges

example.title: Coq au Vin
example.description: Coq au Vin is a classic French dish featuring chicken braised with wine, mushrooms, onions, and bacon

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Brown chicken and bacon. Sauté mushrooms, onions, and garlic. Add wine, broth, and herbs. Simmer until chicken is tender. Serve with crusty bread or mashed potatoes.

example.title: Tiramisu
example.description: Tiramisu is an Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Dip ladyfingers in coffee. Layer with mascarpone mixture. Repeat layers. Dust with cocoa powder. Refrigerate before serving.

example.title: Pizza Margherita
example.description: Pizza Margherita is a classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Roll out pizza dough. Spread tomato sauce. Add slices of mozzarella cheese. Bake until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly. Top with fresh basil leaves and a drizzle of olive oil before serving.

example.title: Hamburger
example.description: The hamburger is an iconic American sandwich consisting of a grilled beef patty served on a bun with various toppings like lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Form ground beef into patties. Grill or fry until cooked to desired doneness. Assemble burgers with desired toppings on toasted buns.

example.title: Sushi Rolls
example.description: Sushi rolls are a Japanese delicacy consisting of vinegared rice, seaweed, and various fillings like fish, vegetables, or tofu.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Spread rice on nori sheet. Add fillings and roll tightly. Slice into bite-sized pieces. Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
